## Implementation Exercises

### Collaborate with a Course Participant ("GitHub Flow")

#### **Private collaboration** with pull requests

1. Add your partner as a collaborator for your recipes repo
1. Clone your partner's repository
1. Create a new branch in your partner's repository
1. Add a recipe to your partner's recipe.qmd file
1. Add and commit the changes
1. Create a Pull Request
1. Review the PR your partner made in your repository
1. Merge the PR into your repository
